name: HOOD
description:
The community token for The Fortunate Few, a multi chain NFT community platform.

HOOD is the community token for The Fortunate Few, a multi-chain NFT community platform and DAO, with its genesis collection available on the Stargaze marketplace. The community interfaces with other NFT collections and communities, including Hooded Syndicate, Jack-O-Hoods and Hoods of Christmas NFT collections. The project also contributed collaboration NFTS on The Cosmic Gumball Machine NFT collection and Wolfhunters, also on Stargaze. Join the ranks of The Fortunate Few and learn more in the official Discord channel here: https://discord.gg/HDRNRTUTXC
